column2: "Na hɛn a yɛyɛ dzen no
column3: ɔsɛ dɛ yɛsoa hɔn a wɔnnyɛ dzen no hɔn mberɛwyɛ
column4: na mma yɛnnsɔ hɛnara hɛn enyi."

column2: "Hom mma hɛn mu obiara nsɔ ne nyɛnko enyi mma ne yieyɛ
column3: mfa ntow ne gyedzi do nkɔ kan."

column2: "Na Kraest so annsɔ nankasa noho enyi
column3: na dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no
column4: Hɔn a wɔhyɛɛ wo ahorba no
column5: hɔn ahorbahyɛ no tɔɔ mo do."

column2: "Na biribiara a wɔkyerɛɛw no nkan no
column3: wɔkyerɛwee maa hɛn nkyerɛkyerɛ
column4: ama ɔnam abotar na kyerɛwnsɛm no n'awerɛkyekyer do yeenya enyidado."

column2: "Na abotar nye awerɛkyekyer Nyankopɔn no mma hom nnya adwenkor wɔ homho nkorkor dɛ mbrɛ Kraest Jesus dze tse
column4: "ama hom dze adwenkor nye anokor aahyɛ hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest ne Nyankopɔn nye n'Egya enyimnyam."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom ngyegye homho
column3: dɛ mbrɛ Kraest so agye hom ama Nyankopɔn n'enyimnyam no."

column2: "Na mese dɛ wɔayɛ Kraest twatsiatwa no ho somfo wɔ Nyankopɔn no nokwar no ntsi
column3: ma ɔaahyɛ egyanom anohoba no dzen
column5: "na amanamamfo aahyɛ Nyankopɔn enyimnyam wɔ n'ehumbɔbɔr ntsi; dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no dɛ
column6: Dɛm ntsi mibeyi wo ayɛw wɔ amanaman mu
column7: Na mabɔ wo dzin atow ndwom."

column2: "Na ɔka no bio dɛ
column3: Amanaman
column4: hom nye ne man ndzi ehurusi

column2: "Na bio
column3: Amanaman
column5: Na hom mma aman horow nyina nkamfo no."

column2: "Na bio Isaia se dɛ
column3: Jesse ndwow no bɛba
column4: Ɔnye nyia ɔbɔsoɛr ebedzi amanaman do: No mu na amanaman benya enyidado."

column2: "Na enyidado Nyankopɔn mfa gyedzi mu enyigye nye asomdwee nyina nhyɛ hom ma
column3: ma hom aabor do wɔ enyidado mu

column2: "Na megye dzi yie wɔ hom ho
column3: mo nuanom
column4: dɛ homankasa so papayɛ nyina ahyɛ hom ma
column5: na nyimdzee nyina ahyɛ hom ma tɔr
column6: na eso hom tum tutu homho fo."

column2: "Naaso medze ndam pii makyerɛw nsɛm yi ho bi abrɛ hom
column3: dɛ medze rebɛkaa hom bio wɔ adom a Nyankopɔn adom me ntsi
column5: "dɛ menyɛ Kraest Jesus somfo mma amanamamfo
column6: na menkɛyɛ Nyankopɔn asɛmpa no ho asɔfodwuma
column7: na amanaman nyɛ afɔr a ɔsɔ enyi a wɔatsew ho wɔ Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mowɔ m'ahohyehyɛ wɔ Kraest Jesus mu wɔ ndzɛmba a ɔfa Nyankopɔn ho mu."
"Na mirinnsi mo bo nnka biribiara ho asɛm gyedɛ dza Kraest edua mo do ayɛ ama amanaman ayɛ setsie
column3: wɔ asɛm nye ndwuma mu
column6: wɔ Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no tum mu. Na maka Kraest n'asɛmpa no nyinara fitsi Jerusalɛm na no ho nkurow mu dze ekesi Ilirikum."

column2: "Dza m'enyi beer ho nye dɛ mebɛka asɛmpa no
column3: wɔ mbrɛ wɔmmbɔɔ Kraest dzin wɔ hɔ pɛn
column4: amma maannkɔtow obi ne fapem do
column6: "na mbom dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no dɛ
column7: Hɔn a no ho asɛm enndu hɔn nkyɛn bohu
column8: Na hɔn a wɔanntse bɛtse ase."

column2: "Na iyi ntsi so na mpɛn pii nye yi a woesiw me kwan amma maammba hom nkyɛn."
"Na afei
column3: minnyi mbew yi do beebi bio
column4: na mfe pii yi nyina mepɛ dɛ meba hom nkyɛn ntsi
column6: "da biara a mubotu kwan akɔ Spain no osiandɛ m'enyi da dɛ murutwa mu a
column8: na sɛ megye m'enyi kakra wɔ hom nkyɛn wie a
column9: hom egya me kwan akɔ hɔ
column11: "na sesei dze morokɔ Jerusalɛm akɔsom ahotseweefo no."

column2: "Na ayɛ Masidonia nye Akia fɛw dɛ wɔdze ntoboa bi kɛma ahotseweefo a wɔwɔ Jerusalɛm mu ehiafo."
"Ɔyɛɛ hɔn fɛw dɛ wɔbɛyɛ
column3: naaso nna wɔdze hɔn kaw
column4: osiandɛ sɛ wɔama amanamamfo enya hɔn sunsum mu ndzɛmba bi a
column5: nna ɔsɛ amanamamfo no so dɛ wɔdze hɔn honam mu afamu ndzɛmba bi som hɔn."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi muwie yi na minya mosɔw aba yi ano ma hɔn a
column3: mebɛba mabɛfa hom nkyɛn akɔ Spain."

column2: "Na minyim dɛ meba hom nkyɛn a
column3: mebɛba no Kraest ne nhyira asɛmpa no ne mayɛ mu."

column2: "Na afei
column3: enuanom
column4: menam hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest nye Sunsum no dɔ do meserɛ hom dɛ hom mfa me tsir do mpaa a hom bɔ serɛ Nyankopɔn ma me no mper mma me;"

column2: "dɛ wobeyi me efi asoɔdzenfo a wɔwɔ Judea nsa
column3: na mo som a morokɔsom wɔ Jerusalɛm no asɔ ahotseweefo no enyi
column5: "ma menam Nyankopɔn pɛ do maaba hom nkyɛn wɔ enyigye mu
column6: na emi nye hom nyina hɛn ho aatɔ hɛn."

column2: "Na asomdwee Nyankopɔn nye hom nyina ntsena. Amen."
